headline: Bahama Breeze is closing all of its restaurants
summary: Bahama Breeze, the Caribbean-themed dining chain, is shutting down after a 30-year stint in the business.

raw.headline: Bahama Breeze is closing all of its restaurants
raw.summary: Bahama Breeze, the Caribbean-themed dining chain, is shutting down after a 30-year stint in the business.

headline: Darden to end its Bahama Breeze brand
summary: The company will close half of the remaining restaurants and convert the rest to other concepts

raw.headline: Darden to end its Bahama Breeze brand
raw.summary: The company will close half of the remaining restaurants and convert the rest to other concepts

headline: Darden Restaurants Completes Exploration of Strategic Alternatives for Bahama Breeze
summary: Darden Restaurants, Inc. ("Darden") (NYSE: DRI) today announced that it has completed its exploration of strategic alternatives for Bahama Breeze. Previously, the company announced that the Bahama Breeze brand, and its 28 locations, were no longer a strategic priority and that it would consider strategic alternatives, including a potential sale of the brand or converting restaurants to other Darden brands.

headline: 1 S&P 500 Stock Worth Investigating and 2 We Brush Off
summary: While the S&P 500 (^GSPC) includes industry leaders, not every stock in the index is a winner. Some companies are past their prime, weighed down by poor execution, weak financials, or structural headwinds.
